title: Encrypted Chat Online AES
description: This is an encrypted chat. All messages will be encrypted using AES algorithm. Free an open source.
keywords: Chat, AES, encrypted, free, open, online, cipher
goal1: All your messages will be encrypted using AES encryption algorithm.
goal2: Your messages will not be stored on the server.
goal3: You can check the source code and be sure of secrecy.
